title: A metal-free photocatalytically active hybrid fiber as a novel self-cleaning adsorbent for enhanced tetracycline removal
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00387J, Paper
Kaijie Ni, Ruiqi Xu, Yanlong Chen, Ming Guo
A recyclable metal-free photocatalytically active hybrid fiber is fabricated, and presents a significantly photo-enhanced removal effect on tetracycline.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
